The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise Hear how companies are transforming into data-driven enterprises by Modernizing their data infrastructure and discovering advanced analytics at scale.
Internet of Things Demo and Architecture Overview
Introduction to a stream processing architecture based on an Internet of Things (IoT) use case and demo. Experts will walk attendees through the architecture, components, data and analytical aspects.
Hands-On Technical Session
